summary: Re-adds Ulfgar the Unendings Dwelling (now called Brodir Cave) to Brodir Grove, along with piece of nostalgia from Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
Brodir Grove and Nerevarine by EndgameV
..........................................................................................................................................

Description:
This is my attempt to add a few things that I thought were missing from Solstheim. This mod adds Ulfgar the Unending\'s dwelling from Bloodmoon, now called Brodir Cave and home to Reavers, to Brodir Grove. 

Also included is a little piece of nostalgia, for all you Morrowind players, hidden at the rear of the cave. I won\'t reveal too much, but hopefully the image gallery will help wet your appetite. There are two versions of the Journal, one with and one without a final message from the author, Choose only one file.

Since Solstheim is the first place Bethesda have deemed to revisit in one their games, I thought it was important to add a stronger sense of return for players between two generations of elder scrolls games. This is my attempt, I hope you\'ll enjoy it.

!Spoilers! About the Journal:
Please don\'t be quick to rage at why things are missing, I know that not EVERY entry from the game is in the journal, but due to the numerous player choices available and to keep the game from freezing from all the text that would be in it, I\'ve only included the main quest entries (vanilla and DLC) and a few side quest entries that have been shown to be confirmed in later games.

The author message on the final page is of my own hand so don\'t assume it to be canon or associated with Bethesda, if you don\'t like it feel free to use the normal esp which removes the message.

Required Files:
Dragonborn DLC of course.

Installation:
Choose only one file!
Mod Manager:
Just click \'Download With Manager\' and install
Manually:
Extract the esp to your skyrim/Data folder

Skyrim and Morrowind belong to Bethesda Softworks
author: EndgameV
